## Access Request

Please provide the following information:

### Requestor Information
- **Full Name:** 
- **GitHub Username:** 
- **GCP Email:** (if different from GitHub email)
- **Team/Role:** 
- **Business Justification:** (Why do you need access?)

### Access Type
Please select the access level you need:

- [ ] **GitHub - Read Access** (view code, open issues)
- [ ] **GitHub - Write Access** (write code, merge PRs)
- [ ] **GitHub - Admin Access** (manage settings, collaborators)
- [ ] **GCP - Viewer** (read-only access to resources)
- [ ] **GCP - Editor** (create/modify resources)
- [ ] **GCP - Owner** (full control, IAM management)

### Approvals

This request must be approved by at least one project maintainer:

- [ ] Approved by: @kushin77
- [ ] Approved by: (Secondary approver, if needed)

### Implementation Notes (For Approvers)

- [ ] GitHub team membership updated
- [ ] GCP IAM role assigned
- [ ] Confirmation sent to requestor
- [ ] Date granted: ___________

### Offboarding Checklist (Upon Access Removal)

- [ ] GitHub team membership revoked
- [ ] GCP IAM role removed
- [ ] Any outstanding PRs/tasks transferred
- [ ] Offboarding date: ___________

**⏱️ Expected Response Time:** 2-3 business days  
**❓ Questions?** Comment below or reach out to @kushin77
